title: Binary Confusion
description:
Binary encoding represents data using only 0s and 1s.

Your task: Decode the following binary message:

01000110 01001100 01000001 01000111 01111011 01100010 01101001 01101110 01100001 01110010 01111001 01011111 01110010 01110101 01101100 01100101 01110011 01111101

 The flag format is FLAG{decrypted_text}
hints: Each 8-bit chunk represents an ASCII character
